content:
IProcessHostIdleAndHealthCheck Interface

Definition

Provides ways to check on the state of a process.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("9d98b251-453e-44f6-9cec-8b5aed970129")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IProcessHostIdleAndHealthCheck

Remarks

IProcessHostIdleAndHealthCheck is introduced in the .NET Framework 3.5 . For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.

Methods

IsIdle()

Gets the state of the application domain.

public bool IsIdle ();
Returns
Boolean

true if the application domain is idle; otherwise, false.

Remarks

IsIdle is introduced in the .NET Framework 3.5 . For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.

Ping(IProcessPingCallback)

Pings a process.

public void Ping (System.Web.Hosting.IProcessPingCallback callback);
callback
IProcessPingCallback

The callback to handle the ping response.

Remarks

Ping is introduced in the .NET Framework 3.5 . For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.
